attributes.action: ALL Construction workers to be one of the first to be vaccinated.
attributes.additional_details: No enough protection for construction workers who have no choice but to go to work where social distancing is near impossible.
attributes.background: We have no choice but to go to work with sometimes hundreds of operatives on the site within close proximity of each other. It is difficult to maintain social distances and almost impossible and I think for this reason we should be up there with key workers to be vaccinated. No protection for us.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568313
